trans-unit.source: Career
trans-unit.target: Career

trans-unit.source: In order to start my career as a software developer I've got solid math and computer science background in NARFU "Applied Mathematics and Computer Science". At that time I participated in math and programming olympiads. As my base programming language I regarded C++ but also I learned and worked with C, Java, Python, Assembly. I've graduated in 2017.
trans-unit.target: In order to start my career as a software developer I've got solid math and computer science background in NARFU "Applied Mathematics and Computer Science". At that time I participated in math and programming olympiads. As my base programming language I regarded C++ but also I learned and worked with C, Java, Python, Assembly. I've graduated in 2017.

trans-unit.source: Short after that I've started my career as backend developer. It was my first experience of commercial software development and that's when I got acquainted with PHP and MySQL, as well as frontend technologies such as Gulp, Webpack, Sass, Babel.
trans-unit.target: Short after that I've started my career as backend developer. It was my first experience of commercial software development and that's when I got acquainted with PHP and MySQL, as well as frontend technologies such as Gulp, Webpack, Sass, Babel.

trans-unit.source: The time has come when native Javascript was not enough in order to keep implementing complex solutions in efficient way. That's when I made decision to learn Vue framework which payed out later.
trans-unit.target: The time has come when native Javascript was not enough in order to keep implementing complex solutions in efficient way. That's when I made decision to learn Vue framework which payed out later.

trans-unit.source: Path lead to resolve more complex problems related to outdated and unmaintainable infrastructure. Being experienced with Node.js In order to resolve some of existed problems I've implemented microservices. There are some of them:
trans-unit.target: Path lead to resolve more complex problems related to outdated and unmaintainable infrastructure. Being experienced with Node.js In order to resolve some of existed problems I've implemented microservices. There are some of them:

trans-unit.source: SMS sending gateway - REST API to send SMS notifications using GSM gateway PDF generator - REST API to convert HTML page to PDF (useful for printing invoices, and not just that) JWT token generator - REST API to generate JWT token pairs (useful for authorization)
trans-unit.target: SMS sending gateway - REST API to send SMS notifications using GSM gateway PDF generator - REST API to convert HTML page to PDF (useful for printing invoices, and not just that) JWT token generator - REST API to generate JWT token pairs (useful for authorization)

trans-unit.source: These services was very useful for each new website.
trans-unit.target: These services was very useful for each new website.

trans-unit.source: Since each service required separate environnment it required a lot of administering efforts, which I was also responsible for. I already had a lot knowledge about FreeBSD operating system, so it was time to apply this knowledge in practice.
trans-unit.target: Since each service required separate environnment it required a lot of administering efforts, which I was also responsible for. I already had a lot knowledge about FreeBSD operating system, so it was time to apply this knowledge in practice.

trans-unit.source: Then I decided to specialize in front-end and move to big projects. That's when I've learned Typescript and Angular which became part of my main technology stack till current day. Such aspects as Search Engine Optimization (SEO), implementing UI test, pixel perfect markup, cross browser development, accessibility - this is what I'm most focused on at work.
trans-unit.target: Then I decided to specialize in front-end and move to big projects. That's when I've learned Typescript and Angular which became part of my main technology stack till current day. Such aspects as Search Engine Optimization (SEO), implementing UI test, pixel perfect markup, cross browser development, accessibility - this is what I'm most focused on at work.

trans-unit.source: RiverTV is a video streaming service provided by RiverTV Inc. from Canada.
trans-unit.target: RiverTV is a video streaming service provided by RiverTV Inc. from Canada.

trans-unit.source: RiverTV offers streaming of live channels and on-demand content. The website is an online shop and streaming web app where RiverTV package and addons can be acquired, managed and watched.
trans-unit.target: RiverTV offers streaming of live channels and on-demand content. The website is an online shop and streaming web app where RiverTV package and addons can be acquired, managed and watched.

trans-unit.source: I developed front-end part.
trans-unit.target: I developed front-end part.

trans-unit.source: Technoligies I used:
trans-unit.target: Technoligies I used:

trans-unit.source: Visit
trans-unit.target: Visit

trans-unit.source: VMedia is an internet service provider from Canada.
trans-unit.target: VMedia is an internet service provider from Canada.

trans-unit.source: Apart from internet it also offers services such as cable-free TV, home phone and home security. The website is online shop where such services can acquired and managed.
trans-unit.target: Apart from internet it also offers services such as cable-free TV, home phone and home security. The website is online shop where such services can acquired and managed.

trans-unit.source: I refactored front-end, implemented new features, fixed bugs, upgraded a lot of legacy code.
trans-unit.target: I refactored front-end, implemented new features, fixed bugs, upgraded a lot of legacy code.

trans-unit.source: "Scarlett & Monarch" CMS
trans-unit.target: "Scarlett & Monarch" CMS

trans-unit.source: "Scarlett & Monarch" is a company of commercial website development and hosting. Content management sytem of "Scarlett & Monarch" is used for each and every website project of company. Each customer has their own requirements. CMS evolved with each new requirement.
trans-unit.target: "Scarlett & Monarch" is a company of commercial website development and hosting. Content management sytem of "Scarlett & Monarch" is used for each and every website project of company. Each customer has their own requirements. CMS evolved with each new requirement.

trans-unit.source: I developed back-end and front-end, updated legacy code, developed new modules such as catalog editor, feedback, orders management.
trans-unit.target: I developed back-end and front-end, updated legacy code, developed new modules such as catalog editor, feedback, orders management.

trans-unit.source: One of the most advanced modules is catalog editor, which allows binding arbitrary properties to product. It allows bind arbitrary properties such as array of products, array of images, text, number, boolean, array of strings or even arbitrary structure if all the previous was not enough. API of web site allows to create advanced search by this properties. Orders module allows to create flexible orders, which change its' structure with every new project. Order has standard properties such as full name and phone number, but also can have any other property which will be displayed and can be modified. This module also allows to modify orders' content, adding, removing and modifying products. Orders' sum recalculates automatically, including discounts. It also allows to notify client via SMS or email about order status.
trans-unit.target: One of the most advanced modules is catalog editor, which allows binding arbitrary properties to product. It allows bind arbitrary properties such as array of products, array of images, text, number, boolean, array of strings or even arbitrary structure if all the previous was not enough. API of web site allows to create advanced search by this properties. Orders module allows to create flexible orders, which change its' structure with every new project. Order has standard properties such as full name and phone number, but also can have any other property which will be displayed and can be modified. This module also allows to modify orders' content, adding, removing and modifying products. Orders' sum recalculates automatically, including discounts. It also allows to notify client via SMS or email about order status.

trans-unit.source: Trik is a pharmacy network from Krasnodar, Russian Federation. The website is an online shop + CMS.
trans-unit.target: Trik is a pharmacy network from Krasnodar, Russian Federation. The website is an online shop + CMS.

trans-unit.source: Trik needed web store that would serve their 5 pharmacies. It required to create custom logic for catalog, cart and orders. Their site has complicated search by dynamically assignable properties tags, and any logical expression which can be constructed from any of properties or tags. Search result can be filtered by dynamically assignable properties.
trans-unit.target: Trik needed web store that would serve their 5 pharmacies. It required to create custom logic for catalog, cart and orders. Their site has complicated search by dynamically assignable properties tags, and any logical expression which can be constructed from any of properties or tags. Search result can be filtered by dynamically assignable properties.

trans-unit.source: I developed back-end, 90% of front-end logic.
trans-unit.target: I developed back-end, 90% of front-end logic.

trans-unit.source: Paxus is a company from Archangelsk, Russian Federation. It constructs and sells offroad vehicles, which can be customized depending on customer's needs. The website is an online shop + CMS.
trans-unit.target: Paxus is a company from Archangelsk, Russian Federation. It constructs and sells offroad vehicles, which can be customized depending on customer's needs. The website is an online shop + CMS.

trans-unit.source: Catalog includes product constructor where customer can customize vehicle parts such as engine, color, features, etc. Available customization for product can be assigned in CMS.
trans-unit.target: Catalog includes product constructor where customer can customize vehicle parts such as engine, color, features, etc. Available customization for product can be assigned in CMS.

trans-unit.source: I developed back-end and Implemented most complex parts of front-end logic.
trans-unit.target: I developed back-end and Implemented most complex parts of front-end logic.

trans-unit.source: Administration of Kemerovo, Russian Federation, ordered a web site to post relevent information related to business of Kemerovo city. The website has news lines, search, feedback and CMS to manage it all.
trans-unit.target: Administration of Kemerovo, Russian Federation, ordered a web site to post relevent information related to business of Kemerovo city. The website has news lines, search, feedback and CMS to manage it all.

trans-unit.source: I developed back-end.
